alert.note: Alert for Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 6:40AM EDT until July 15 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Connecticut...Massachusetts... Connecticut River At Thompsonville affecting Hartford and Hampden Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Connecticut River At Middle Haddam affecting Middlesex County. Connecticut River At Hartford affecting Hartford and Middlesex Counties. For the Connecticut River...including Montague, Northampton, Holyoke Dam, Holyoke, Springfield, Thompsonville, Hartford, Middle Haddam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River at Thompsonville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Lowland flooding will begin along the Connecticut River near Thompsonville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM EDT Friday was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 13.9 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 05/01/1988. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EDT.
